page.title: 12A BOW SHOPS' SURVEY
page.content: {Bow}has 4 shops,2 banks,a hairdresser, a doctor's surgery,a Post Office and 2 garages.At the top of the village is Riddaways,a grocery and confectionery shop.Next door is the Kings Arms.In the village street is F.B.Averys another grocers and confectioners. Opposite is the butchers and Lloyds Bank.The Post Office is in the centre of the village and sells stationery and stamps.Opposite is Central Garage selling oil,petrol and gas.Further down the village is Alan Jewells the newsagents and the doctors is opposite.The 2nd garage is next to the NatWest Bank and opposite the hairdresser.The White Hart and The Arrow are hotels at the bottom of the village.We found that everyone uses Bow shops but most shopping is done in Crediton 8 miles away.Exeter is sometimes visited for shopping.
